name: 'Zowie' dress - Green wallpaper
description:
This gorgeous dress has a fitted bodice and flared skirt, gathered at the waist.  The shoulder straps tie up in a bow.
Invisible zip closure in the centre back, half lined with self fabric.

Fabric: 100% Cotton 

This garment is ready to ship in sizes 8, 10 and 12.  Please allow 2-3 weeks shipping for other sizes.

Model: Candice DeVille - http://www.superkawaiimama.com.au/

name: 'Gabrielle' top - black and white stripe
description:
I wanted to create a top that could be dressed up or down, worn with a scoop neck or a boat neck and be long enough to be tucked in to a pair or jeans or pencil skirt. I wanted to create a top that could double as a maternity top and still be worn post-natally with a maternity bra and not have to worry about it showing.

The 'Gabrielle' top is made using the same body shape as my 'Frankie' top and it is the same length. This top can be worn with the scoop neck in the front or switched around and be worn with the higher neckline at the front.

Fabric: 60% Polyester/32% Viscose/8% Spandex

This item is ready to ship.

Made in Australia

Model: Candice DeVille - http://www.superkawaiimama.com.au/

description:

name: The Perfect Black Belt - made to your waist measurement
description:
I call it the "Perfect Black Belt" because it suits a wide range of waist sizes. 

It is a great addition to both shift and full skirted dresses, and would look oh so sweet worn with a pencil skirt.

I use a non-crush extra heavy weight fusing to make the belt 'stiff'.

Belt size: made to your waist measurement

Width of belt: 2"

Fabric composition: Polyester/Viscose/Rayon

The fabric has been Scotch Guarded on both sides after the belt has been made.

IMPORTANT NOTE: the dress is not included in this sale.

Both cover and cushion  - Made in Australia

This item is sent by express post.

name: 1950s style Petticoat/Underskirt
description:
This petticoat (or underskirt as we call them in Australia) is made by Malco Modes and is a perfect addition under a swinging dress or skirt (great under my 'Rocker Girl Jane' dresses!).

Size small measures 27" from waist to hem.
Fits waist: 23" to 42"

Size medium measures 28" from waist to hem.
Fits waist: 25" to 46"

Size large measures 29" from waist to hem.
Fits waist: 27" to 50"

Outer skirt: nylon net with satin binding on hem
Inner skirt: nylon organza (non-scratchy) with satin binding on hem.

*This skirt is also available in Black.

Please allow 2-3 weeks delivery for this item.

name: Checkerboard toddler dress
description:
Cute toddler dress has an invisible zip in the centre back and front button detail.

Fabric: 100% Cotton

Made in Australia

*This item can be sent by express post within Australia upon request.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
'Peta Pledger' Gift Vouchers make a great gift, but are also a great way to "save up" for a new garment.

Our vouchers can be used online and are also redeemable on made to measure/custom made clothing.

Each voucher is sent in a pretty envelope and can be sent directly to you, or the address of the lucky person receiving it as a gift.

'Peta Pledger' Gift Vouchers are only valid for 12 months upon purchase date.

name: Tape measure - metric and imperial - to take your measurements!
description:
Do you want to buy something from my online store, but can't find a tape measure?
